description: Stores address information for students, including current and permanent addresses. Contains fields like city, country, and zip code.
Holds details about academic courses offered. Includes course name and description.
Contains information about academic departments. Stores department name and description.
Manages data on degree programs offered by departments. Links to departments and includes summary details.
Stores information about specific sections of courses. Connects to courses and includes section-specific details.
Tracks semester periods for student enrollment. Includes semester name and description.
Maintains student personal and contact information. Links to addresses and tracks registration dates.
Records student enrollment in degree programs for specific semesters. Connects students, programs, and semesters.
Links enrolled students to specific courses they are taking. Junction table between enrollment and courses.
Stores transcript records with issuance dates. Used to track academic progress.
Connects transcripts to specific course enrollments. Junction table detailing transcript contents.
